name: Sandwich Heist
description:
Tonight you sneak through your office building,  hoping to find the sandwich your boss had taken from you in work earlier. But be careful, your boss seems to have installed more security, don't get caught on camera and make sure get back to the  alley without being seen or you'll be fired.

Music: 
Portfolio: https://www.zachstriefel.com/
Twitter: @zstriefel
